Workshop.Title: Reception of The Teal Archivist, Classic Edition
Workshop.Description:
An attempt to port and improve the Teal Archivist mod from Basemod to the Workshop using PM's workshop tools, done by the Teal Archivist's creator. An improved, non-fixed deck version with full story will be released at a later date. It will be called Lost Library.
Edited Combat Page Art and Character Sprite(s) by MaBoi000. Code and coding assistance provided by uGuardian, who is basically the reason this is possible. Original TA Sprite and Book Icon by ccyb, who is another reason this is possible.
Workshop.PreviewImage: E:\Pictures\LC and LOR\Modding and Backup\My Mods\Actual Mods\Classic TA Mod\Resource\CombatPageArtwork\TA.png
